description: 1 x Hornbeam (applicants ref. T5) - Crown reduce back to previous points of reduction to provide 2.5m clearance of building, re-reduce back lateral spread on north and east to previous points of redcution, crown lift up to 5m AGL and remove epicormic growth.1 x Hornbeam (applicants ref. T6) - Crown reduce back to previous points of reduction to provide 2.5m clearance of building, reduce back lateral spread on all side and top of crown, crown lift up to 5m AGL and remove epicormic growth.Remove the large volumes of old leaves and detritus from the fork at least 2 times per year.1 x Sycamore (applicants ref. T7) - Crown reduce down to approx. 4m above the old primary reduction points. Approximately 10m high AGL final height, Crown thin 20%, Remove epicormic growth from trunk up to 5m AGL, reduce back any resultant crown growth to provide a minimum 3m clearance to building.1 x Sycamore (applicants ref. T7.1) - Crown reduce down to approx. 4m above the old primary reduction points. Approximately 10m high AGL final height, Crown thin 20%, Remove epicormic growth from trunk up to 5m AGL, reduce back any resultant crown growth to provide a minimum 3m clearance to building.1 x Silver Birch (applicants ref. T7.2) - Cut Back overhang to site by approximately 3m and formative prune Alternative Works: Fell to ground level and poison stump.1 x Holly (applicants ref. T8) - Just trim as required, possible could tip out to improve form.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
